code: import React from"react";import'../stylesheets/Header.css';import{CDBSidebar,CDBSidebarContent,CDBSidebarFooter,CDBSidebarHeader,CDBSidebarMenu,CDBSidebarMenuItem}from'cdbreact';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';/*  Icons are taken from: https://fontawesome.com/v4/icons/ */ /* Código tomado de https://www.devwares.com/blog/create-responsive-sidebar-in-react/ */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ResponsiveSidebar(_ref){let{headerText,footerText}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{position:'fixed',display:'flex',height:'100vh',overflow:'scroll initial',fontFamily:'Work Sans'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CDBSidebar,{textColor:"#fff",backgroundColor:"#333",toggled:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CDBSidebarHeader,{prefix:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-bars fa-large",style:{fontSize:'28px'}}),children:headerText}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CDBSidebarContent,{className:"sidebar-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CDBSidebarMenu,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{exact:true,to:"/",activeClassName:"activeClicked",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CDBSidebarMenuItem,{icon:"th-large",children:"Inicio"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/GeneralForm",activeClassName:"activeClicked",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CDBSidebarMenuItem,{icon:"address-card",children:"Formulario"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{exact:true,to:"/",activeClassName:"activeClicked",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CDBSidebarMenuItem,{icon:"user-times",children:"Salir"})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CDBSidebarFooter,{style:{textAlign:'center'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar-btn-wrapper",style:{padding:'20px 5px'},children:footerText})})]})});}export default ResponsiveSidebar;
